title: The Artificially Intelligent Government
description: The world is undergoing a digital transformation. And, there are heroes who are riding this transformation, trying to create an impact on society by helping governments and citizens using artificial intelligence.This book talks about some such real life heroes who have been using new age technologies to solve problems of the world. Written as a narrative, it covers interconnected true stories, all directly connected to the author, through chapters that help us realise the inevitable advent of the artificially intelligent government. Sapio Analytics in developing countries and Palantir Technologies in the US are some companies that have pioneered the concept of the artificial intelligent government, and the book covers stories that prove that a new era of transformation has already begun.
author: Ashwin Srivastava
